name: Golf Extreme
description:
Do you consider golf a boring sport? Our fox will prove to you that this is an exciting game, where you can hone your skills and thinking! You will not have to run around the field with wings and collect balls.

In our golf you can play, without leaving from the screen of the monitor! The rules are simple - you need to calculate the trajectory and score balls in all holes, at that doing no more than 10 blows. With each level, the path to the holes will be more difficult. There will be new barriers and trials. So excessive accuracy doesn’t hurt! All that is required of you is to be precise and prudent.

In our golf you are expected:

- Bright graphics and a pretty red fox.
- Several different worlds.
- 100 levels with a huge number of tests
- Easy and convenient mouse control.
- The laws of physics and the spirit of the original game.
-Steam Achievements

Golf it’s interest, excitement and passion! Become a master in this wonderful game!
